Label: Event occurrence description
Description: Free text describing the promotional event occurrence. Optional, and repeatable to provide parallel text in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <EventDescription>, but must be included in each instance if <EventDescription> is repeated.
Format: Variable length text, suggested maximum length 1000 characters. XHTML is enabled in this element – see Using XHTML, HTML, XML, JSON within ONIX text fields
Example: The author will read excerpts from her new novel Crimetime, and answer audience questions.
